overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active presence on Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, engaging a total of 3,580 followers with a focus on computational social science and disinformation research. Engagement varies across platforms with LinkedIn showing the highest interaction rates.

contentThemes.description: Exploration of methodological approaches and studies on disinformation across platforms.
Opportunities and discussions about computational methods for social media analysis.
Updates on grants, publications, and team achievements in social media research.

recommendations: Increase cross-platform promotion to leverage followers from LinkedIn for greater visibility on Mastodon and Bluesky.
Incorporate more interactive content like polls or Q&A sessions to boost engagement rates.

platformInsights.mastodon: Engagement is moderate; posts about new tools and methodologies receive positive interaction.
platformInsights.linkedin: High engagement with professional announcements; job postings and grant announcements are particularly well-received.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
